question: i take about 3 hits of pot every night i havnt smoked since last night and have a drug test tomorrow?
question_content: will the thc show up in the drug test?

answers.answer_content: Yes, it takes about two weeks for THC to leave your system, and longer if you smoke very regularly, so you are pretty much 100% guaranteed to fail the drug test.
Unfortunately my fello pot smoker, Yes it will. THC generally takes 28 days or so with lots of excercise and drinking water to not show up anymore on a drug test. I apoligize for the sad news
